results.title: Resolution of confluent and reticulated papillomatosis after bariatric surgery.
results.text_hl: This case report describes an African American adolescent female with @DISEASE_Obesity @DISEASE_MESH:D009765 @@@obesity@@@ with a @DISEASE_Exanthema @DISEASE_MESH:D005076 @@@rash@@@ diagnosed as @DISEASE_Papilloma @DISEASE_MESH:D010212 @@@CARP@@@ after unsuccessful treatment with antifungals and corticosteroids. @<m>DISEASE_Glycogen_Storage_Disease_Type_VI</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006013 @@@Her@@@ @DISEASE_Skin_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D012871 @@@dermatosis@@@ proved recalcitrant to antibiotics and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ but started to resolve immediately after bariatric surgery.

citations.NLM: Krishnamoorthy M, Nadler E, Vaidya S. Resolution of confluent and reticulated papillomatosis after bariatric surgery. Clin Obes. 2021 Feb;11(1):e12427. PMID: 33164331
